DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect different dietary fat ( saturate unsaturated ) postprandial endotoxemia systemic low grade acute inflammation . The investigator hypothesize meal rich saturate n-6 fatty acid would increase postprandial endotoxemia meal high n-3 fatty acid would decrease postprandial endotoxemia.Participants recruit via email randomize treatment meal single-blind , cross-over study . Each test session participant report laboratory right away morning . An indwelling catheter insert participant non-dominant arm qualify nurse baseline blood draw take . The participant provide one four test meal ( porridge-type meal contain different dietary fat ) , ate entirety within 15 minute . The participant remain laboratory next five half hour allow consume food drink except water . During time , blood draw take interval one hour total five hour consumption test meal . Collected blood process on-site serum fraction collect tested endotoxin , inflammatory biomarkers , metabolite .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Dietary Fat Postprandial Endotoxemia Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 40 year old ; Willingness eat test meal ; Body mass index ≥ 19.9 ±0.8 ≤ 24.9 ±0.8 ; Weight stable ( < 2 kilogram weight change previous 3 month ) Presence acute chronic disease ; Use tobacco product ; Consumes 21 unit alcohol per week ; Use antiinflammatory medication ; History suggestive macronutrient malabsorption
